summary: Auto Dealer Module testing completed. All backend APIs (23/23 tests passed) and frontend UI flows working correctly. Multi-currency support (SRD, EUR, USD) verified on all pages.

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts clicks - requires force=True for button clicks inside modals

passed_tests: Backend: Login authentication (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/stats - Dashboard stats with multi-currency revenue
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/vehicles - List vehicles
Backend: POST /api/autodealer/vehicles - Create vehicle with multi-currency pricing
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/vehicles/{id} - Get single vehicle
Backend: PUT /api/autodealer/vehicles/{id} - Update vehicle
Backend: DELETE /api/autodealer/vehicles/{id} - Delete vehicle
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/vehicles?status=in_stock - Filter by status
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/customers - List customers
Backend: POST /api/autodealer/customers - Create customer (individual and business)
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/customers/{id} - Get single customer
Backend: PUT /api/autodealer/customers/{id} - Update customer
Backend: DELETE /api/autodealer/customers/{id} - Delete customer
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/customers?search=... - Search customers
Backend: GET /api/autodealer/sales - List sales
Backend: POST /api/autodealer/sales - Create sale (updates vehicle status to sold)
Backend: DELETE /api/autodealer/sales/{id} - Delete sale (restores vehicle status)
Backend: Multi-currency pricing validation (SRD, EUR, USD)
Backend: Delete constraints (cannot delete sold vehicles, customers with sales)
Frontend: Auto Dealer Dashboard loads with stats cards
Frontend: Currency selector (SRD/EUR/USD) updates revenue display
Frontend: Sidebar shows AUTO DEALER section with navigation items
Frontend: Voertuigen page - list, create, edit, delete vehicles
Frontend: Klanten page - list, create customers with all fields
Frontend: Verkopen page - create sale dialog with vehicle/customer dropdowns
Frontend: Multi-currency price inputs on all forms
critical_code_review_comments: Dialog overlay issue in frontend - buttons inside modals require force=True to click (minor UX issue, not blocking)
Test data cleanup: Some TEST_AUTODEALER_ prefixed customers may remain in database from backend tests
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_autodealer.py - Created comprehensive test suite for Auto Dealer module
seed_data_creation: Created test vehicle (Mazda CX-5) and customer (Jan de Vries) during UI testing

Dashboard.description: Stats cards show total vehicles, in stock, sold, customers, revenue with currency selector

Vehicles CRUD.description: Create, read, update, delete vehicles with multi-currency pricing (SRD, EUR, USD)

Customers CRUD.description: Create, read, update, delete customers (individual and business types)

Sales CRUD.description: Create sales linking vehicles and customers, vehicle status updates to sold

Multi-currency display.description: Currency selector on all pages correctly updates price displays

Sidebar navigation.description: AUTO DEALER section visible with Auto Dashboard, Voertuigen, Klanten, Verkopen links

context_for_next_testing_agent: Auto Dealer module fully tested and working. Test file at /app/backend/tests/test_autodealer.py with 23 passing tests. All CRUD operations verified for vehicles, customers, and sales. Multi-currency support (SRD, EUR, USD) working on all pages. Sidebar navigation shows AUTO DEALER section when addon is active.
